definitions: Past tense of strap: fastened or secured with a strap or straps.
Past tense of strap: provided with a strap or straps.
Past tense of strap: hit or beat with a strap.
Past tense of strap: (slang) equipped with a weapon, especially a gun.
examples: He strapped the luggage to the roof rack.
The camera was strapped to his wrist.
The teacher strapped the disobedient student.
